strapiPost.title: Become The Big Brother Or Big Sister You Always Needed
strapiPost.photoCredit: Big Brothers Big Sisters of NWA
strapiPost.content:
Currently, fifty-five kids are waiting to be paired with a mentor through Big Brothers Big Sisters of NWA; on average, two kids join the waitlist daily.

  • Empathy: You don't have to be perfect to be a Big Brother or Big Sister; all it takes is consistency and care to make a difference in someone's life.
  • Commitment: BBBS asks Bigs to commit to their Little for one year, meeting twice monthly to connect and encourage.

Waiting in line is the worst. End someone's wait by joining HERE.
